reproduction.original_crash: MooreToCore dialect conversion assertion failure in SVModuleOpConversion::matchAndRewrite
reproduction.root_cause_analysis: Crash occurs during Moore to Core dialect conversion when processing SVModuleOp. The dyn_cast on InOutType fails with assertion 'dyn_cast on a non-existent value', indicating a type mismatch or invalid type in port handling.

test_case.name: packed_struct_union_typedef
test_case.description: SystemVerilog module with packed struct and union typedefs used in port declaration
key_features: Union typedef used as port type
